alert.note: Alert for Dickson; Houston; Humphreys (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 09 at 2:57PM CST until December 09 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Dickson County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Houston County in Middle Tennessee... Humphreys County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 400 PM CST. * At 257 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Johnsonville, or near Camden, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dickson, Waverly, Camden, New Johnsonville, McEwen, Burns, Hurricane Mills, Charlotte, Vanleer, and I-40 Near The Tennessee River. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 136 and 142, between mile markers 159 and 160, and between mile markers 164 and 172. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
